welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Jeffersonville! Get ready to experience the charm of our historic town and all it has to offer. From delicious local cuisine to picturesque views, we invite you to explore and enjoy every moment of your stay here."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bowman Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Louisville International Airport houses the ticketing counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Louisville International Airport serves domestic flights for airlines such as American, Delta, and United.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Louisville International Airport serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as Southwest, Allegiant, and Frontier.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.
